name: ConditionalContainer
desc: The object for defining conditional properties for a container component, and when the conditional properties are in effect.

items.name: conditions
items.desc: An instance or array of conditions that, when met, cause the conditional container properties to take effect.

items.name: allowAutoplacedAds
items.desc: A Boolean value that allows the placement of ad banners between components. Nested components inherit the value of the outermost container that explicitly sets allowAutoplacedAds. The default value is true.

items.name: anchor
items.desc: An object that defines vertical alignment with another component.

items.name: animation
items.desc: An object that defines an animation to be applied to the component.To remove a previously set condition, use none.

items.name: behavior
items.desc: An object that defines behavior for a component, like Parallax or Springy.To remove a previously set condition, use none.

items.name: contentDisplay
items.desc: An object that defines how to position child components within this ConditionalContainer  component. A HorizontalStackDisplay, for example, allows for displaying child components side by side.In versions of News prior to iOS 11, child components are positioned as if contentDisplay were not defined.To remove a previously set condition, use none.

items.name: hidden
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the component is hidden.

items.name: layout
items.desc: An inline ComponentLayout object that contains layout information, or a string reference to a ComponentLayout object that is defined at the top level of the document. If layout is not defined, size and position are based on various factors, such as the device type, the length of the content, and the role of this component.

items.name: style
items.desc: An inline ComponentStyle object that defines the appearance of this component, or a string reference to a ComponentStyle that is defined at the top level of the document.To remove a previously set condition, use none.
